bug.author: catalinad90
bug.summary: Manage contributors not visible Kubeflow v0.6.2
bug.description: Good day, I have installed Kubeflow v0.6.2 with istio <denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/v0.6-branch/bootstrap/config/kfctl_k8s_istio.0.6.2.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/v0.6-branch/bootstrap/config/kfctl_k8s_istio.0.6.2.yaml</denchmark-link> and kfctl v0.6.2 on a Kubernetes cluster v1.14. I'm not able to see the manage contributors tab from the dashboard, but I can create new profiles from cli with kubectl. Can someone provide support on what might be missing? Thanks, Catalina

comments.comment:
Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the labels:
Label Probability
kind/bug 0.63
Please mark this comment with or to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-botdata/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/catalinad90>@catalinad90</denchmark-link> You need to use manifest with multi-user support. <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/components/multi-tenancy/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/components/multi-tenancy/</denchmark-link> check here.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Jeffwan>@Jeffwan</denchmark-link>
What you have sent me is for v1.0, but I have v0.6.2. This manifest can be applied to v0.6.2? And where exactly can I find it. The manifests used for the kubeflow deployment are the ones referenced in the istio file for version v0.6.2: <denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/v0.6-branch/bootstrap/config/kfctl_k8s_istio.0.6.2.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/v0.6-branch/bootstrap/config/kfctl_k8s_istio.0.6.2.yaml</denchmark-link>
Thanks, Catalina

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/catalinad90>@catalinad90</denchmark-link> I mean kfctl_k8s_istio.0.6.2.yaml this manifest doesn't have multi-user support. This feature is not available for all manifest
